resources.string: I am a 36 year old husband, father, and computer science major at UCSC.my wifes name is Lauren. My son is 4 years old, his name is Matthias. We live in Hayward California. My hobbies include doing Brazilian Jiu-Jitsu, watching live sports, and traveling. Most of the time, I am studying or working as a Care Attendant.

Brazilian Jiu-Jitsu is known among other martial arts as "The Gentle Art" because it is a grappling sport with no striking. Since there is no striking, sparing is done at 100% intensity and mimics live competition very well. essentially a match is over when either someone submits, by tapping out, or the timer runs out and scores are tallied.

I am blessed to live in the East Bay. We have 3 sports teams, The Oakland Athletics, The Oakland Raiders, and the Golden State Warriors. I am a season ticket holder for The Athletics and The Raiders. I go to an away game for The Raiders annually.

My family and I do a lot of domestic travel. We have toured the east coast by car, we frequent New Orleans, and try to visit a different American major city every year. We have a lot of fun with this hobby. I often combine this hobby with my sports hobby. I recently traveled with the Raiders to a very cold Philadelphia.
